verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- now there was אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish Now there was a man; מִבִּן־ mib-bin- ימין ya-min כמִבִּנְיָמִ֗ין <WH1144> mib-bin-ya-Min, Benjamin קוּ֠שְׁמוֹ <WH8034> u-she-mo whose name קִ֣ישׁ <WH7027> kish [was] Kish בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲבִיאֵ֞ל <WH22> 'a-vi-'El of Abiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צְר֧וֹר <WH6872> tze-Ror of Zeror בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בְּכוֹרַ֛ת <WH1064> be-cho-Rat of Bechorath בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲפִ֖יחַ <WH647> 'a-Fi-ach of Aphiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man יְמִינִ֑י <WH3227> ye-mi-Ni; right גִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor a mighty חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> Cha-yil. of power

וְלוֹ־ ve-lov- הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had בֵ֜ן <WH1121> ven And he had a son וּשְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> u-she-Mo whose name שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul [was] Saul בָּח֣וּר <WH970> ba-Chur a choice young man וָט֔וֹב <WH2896> va-Tov, and a goodly וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish person מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei and [there was] not among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov a goodlier מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu; than מִשִּׁכְמ֣וֹ <WH7926> mish-shich-Mo than he from his shoulders וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward גָּבֹ֖הַּ <WH1364> ga-Vo-ah [he was] higher מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol any הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. than any of the people

וַתֹּאבַ֙דְנָה֙ <WH6> vat-to-Vad-nah were lost הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <WH860> ha-'a-to-Not, And the asses לְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> le-Kish of Kish אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi father שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; Saul's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said קִ֜ישׁ <WH7027> kish And Kish אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul to Saul בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son קַח־ <WH3947> kach- Take נָ֤א <WH4994> na now אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַחַ֣ד <WH259> 'a-Chad now one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> me-han-ne-'a-Rim, of the servants וְק֣וּם <WH6965> ve-Kum with thee and arise לֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> Lech, go בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> bak-Kesh seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲתֹנֹֽת׃ <WH860> ha-'a-to-Not. the asses

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> vai-ya-'a-Vor And he passed through בְּהַר־ <WH2022> be-har- mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> vai-ya-'a-Vor and passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> be-'e-retz- the land שָׁלִ֖שָׁה <WH8031> sha-Li-shah of Shalisha וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not מָצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> ma-Tza-'u; but they found וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'av-Ru [them] not then they passed through בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> ve-'e-retz- the land שַׁעֲלִים֙ <WH8171> sha-'a-Lim of Shalim וָאַ֔יִן <WH369> va-'A-yin, else וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> vai-ya-'a-Vor and [there they were] not and he passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> be-'e-retz- the land יְמִינִ֖י <WH3227> ye-mi-Ni right וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <WH4672> ma-Tza-'u. but they found

הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, they בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u [And] when they were come בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz to the land צ֔וּף <WH6689> Tzuf, of Zuph וְשָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul Saul אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said לְנַעֲר֥וֹ <WH5288> le-na-'a-Ro to his servant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with לְכָ֣ה <WH1980> le-Chah Come וְנָשׁ֑וּבָה <WH7725> ve-na-Shu-vah; and let us return פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or יֶחְדַּ֥ל <WH2308> yech-Dal leave אָבִ֛י <WH1> 'a-Vi lest my father מִן־ <WH4480> min- about הָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <WH860> ha-'a-to-Not [caring] for the asses וְדָ֥אַג <WH1672> ve-Da-'ag and take thought לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said ל֗וֹ lo, הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold נָ֤א <WH4994> na now אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him of God בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir unto him Behold now [there is] in this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ve-ha-'Ish man נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> nich-Bad, and [he is] an honourable כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber all that he saith בּ֣וֹא <WH935> Bo cometh יָב֑וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo; surely to pass עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now נֵ֣לֲכָה <WH1980> Ne-la-chah that we should go שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there אוּלַי֙ <WH194> 'u-Lai perhaps יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> yag-Gid thither peradventure he can shew לָ֔נוּ La-nu, אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דַּרְכֵּ֖נוּ <WH1870> dar-Ke-nu us our way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הָלַ֥כְנוּ <WH1980> ha-Lach-nu have set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיֹּ֤סֶף <WH3254> vai-Yo-sef again הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> han-Na-'ar And the servant לַעֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> la-'a-Not answered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, Saul וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> nim-Tza Behold I have בְיָדִ֔י <WH3027> ve-ya-Di, here at hand רֶ֖בַע <WH7253> Re-va' the fourth part שֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> She-kel of a shekel כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> Ka-sef; of silver וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti [that] will I give לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וְהִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> ve-hig-Gid to tell לָ֖נוּ La-nu אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דַּרְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH1870> dar-Ke-nu. us our way
